mapper.select: select l_Time, l_Remain, l_Empty, l_Amount from LogData where d_No = #{d_No};
mapper.update: update LogData set l_Time = #{l_Time}, l_Remain = #{l_Remain} where l_No = #{l_No};
mapper.select: select substr(l_Time, 6, 5) as 'l_Time2', sum(l_Remain) as 'l_Remain' from LogData where d_No = #{d_No} group by l_Time2;
